TopicTitle: [WIP] Never Enuff Dakka:- A BDArmory expansion [Release 3]

Articles.Content:
![NED.jpg](http://s27.postimg.org/sthdic7j7/NED.jpg)

**Because you can never have enough guns.**

**This is an add-on to the amazing BDArmory, which you can find here:**

[**http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-1-0-BDArmory-v0-8-0-%28AI-pilots-smarter-guards-etc%29-Dev-Thread-May-2**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-1-0-BDArmory-v0-8-0-%28AI-pilots-smarter-guards-etc%29-Dev-Thread-May-2)

**Kerbal Foundries is recommended:**

[**http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84102-PARTS-PLUGIN-1-0-V1-8G-Kerbal-Foundries-wheels-anti-grav-repulsors-and-tracks**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84102-PARTS-PLUGIN-1-0-V1-8G-Kerbal-Foundries-wheels-anti-grav-repulsors-and-tracks)

**This expansion is currently WIP so don't come here expecting stability. If you find bugs please let me know.**

**Release 3 updates:**

-Added Bofors mk4b 40mm Autocannon

-Added Falcon unmanned turret

**Release 2 updates:**

-Added FV101 Scorpion chassis

-Added FV101 Scorpion turrets, 76mm and 90mm versions

-Added Oto Melara 76mm Naval Autocannon

-Leviathan turret now consumes electricity

-Various tweaks

-Removed Kerbab

**Currently contains:**

**L131 AS-90 155mm Howitzer**

![2015_05_03_00003.jpg](http://s28.postimg.org/bsde5tz7x/2015_05_03_00003.jpg)

A 155mm Howitzer, explosive fun.

**FV107 Scimitar turret. 30mm RARDEN**

![2015_05_03_00004.jpg](http://s1.postimg.org/5xn00oilb/2015_05_03_00004.jpg)

30mm RARDEN Autocannon mounted on a FV101 Scorpion turret

**FV4201 Chieftain turret (Tank hull included)**

![2015_05_02_00008.jpg](http://s2.postimg.org/kt8jn218p/2015_05_02_00008.jpg)

120mm Rifled gun. Tank body included as a separate part, might be glitchy.

**FV4034 Challenger II Turret (Tank hull included)**

![2015_05_03_00006.jpg](http://s3.postimg.org/nvvmqlpub/2015_05_03_00006.jpg)

120mm Rifled gun. Tank body included as a separate part, might be glitchy.

**HT-10 Leviathan Railgun**

![2015_05_03_00007.jpg](http://s3.postimg.org/haiwqu9zn/2015_05_03_00007.jpg)

Horrendously overpowered

**KV-2 Glorious Tower of Stalin 152mm Derpgun**

![2015_05_03_00008.jpg](http://s16.postimg.org/jddxql0zp/2015_05_03_00008.jpg)

Warning, firing this gun may literally rip a hole in reality.

Many thanks to berggeit for the KV-2's model.

**FV101 Scorpion 76mm and 90mm turrets (Chassis included)**

**76mm:**

![2015_05_07_00003.jpg](http://s15.postimg.org/c5yf1tjob/2015_05_07_00003.jpg)

**90mm:**

![2015_05_07_00004.jpg](http://s23.postimg.org/gg4j5f0m3/2015_05_07_00004.jpg)

**Oto Melara 76mm Naval Autocannon:**

![2015_05_07_00001.jpg](http://s12.postimg.org/61l8zwa8t/2015_05_07_00001.jpg)

**120 rounds per minute... 'nuff said**

**Bofors mk4b 40mm Autocannon:**

![2015_05_09_00007.jpg](http://s17.postimg.org/v8kovvkr3/2015_05_09_00007.jpg)

Uses 30mm Ammo, go figure.

**Falcon unmanned turret:**

![2015_05_09_00006.jpg](http://s11.postimg.org/fopfl65g3/2015_05_09_00006.jpg)

120mm Smoothbore cannon.
